subtitle: Use a fish-shaped mould for a spectacular centrepiece for a buffet.

method.text: Prepare gelatine with water, according to pack instructions. Place in a blender with the salmon, lemon juice, soured cream, a little water and seasoning to taste. Blend for 1 min. Turn into a basin.  Leave for 5 min.
Fold in the whipped cream and the diced cucumber. Spoon into an oiled 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>5</sub> litre (2pt) fish-shaped mould. Chill for 2 hours.
Turn mousse out onto a serving dish.

title: Quick and easy salmon mousse
